body_html:
I'm using Bazel version 0.2.0 and i installed bazel with this bazel-0.2.0-installer-linux-x86_64.sh

I even tried with bazel version 0.1.3 ,but its has some problem in fetching from external resource and giving this error:

Sending SIGTERM to previous Bazel server (pid=2890)... done.
.........
ERROR: no such package 'external': Error encountered while dealing with the WORKSPACE file: WORKSPACE file could not be parsed.
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.634s

body:
I'm using Bazel version 0.2.0 and i installed bazel with this  bazel-0.2.0-installer-linux-x86_64.sh

I even tried with bazel version 0.1.3 ,but its has some problem in fetching from external resource and giving this error:

Sending SIGTERM to previous Bazel server (pid=2890)... done.
.........
ERROR: no such package 'external': Error encountered while dealing with the WORKSPACE file: WORKSPACE file could not be parsed.
